contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of June, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation not permitted). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filing to counsel of record.
